coreQueryPageProvider.name: DEFAULT_DOCUMENT_SUGGESTION
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE /*+ES: INDEX(dc:title.fulltext) OPERATOR(match_phrase_prefix) */ ecm:fulltext.dc:title LIKE '?' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed = 0 AND ecm:parentId IS NOT NULL
